name: Finding Light
description: Finding Light is a grayscale handheld-style RPG that follows the tale of Mari and her journey to find her beloved partner Abbie and solve the mystery of Heaven's Door.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 and above Processor: Intel Core2 duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: 2.4GHz Intel quad-core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
